message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a fantastic [product name] that I think you'd really appreciate. I'm asking for $200 for it. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the [product name], but I'm looking for something within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $175?
Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your budget. I'm willing to come down a bit to $185. This would still allow me to make a reasonable profit. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for adjusting your price, Alice. I appreciate the flexibility. Considering my budget, could we possibly agree on $170 for the [product name]? I believe this would be fair for both of us.
